titleStmt.title: The learned maid; or, Whether a maid may be a scholar? A logick exercise / written in latine by that incomparable virgin Anna Maria à Schurman of Vtrecht. With some epistles to the famous Gassendus and others.
titleStmt.author: Schurman, Anna Maria van, 1607-1678.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
